Daily News

  • 24517:09 : 12.02.2024

    Shandalowicz will send messages to the Volom school where the blood flows.

    A Speaker of Parliament visited several schools in the Muezer region during a working visit. As the President of the X Assembly reported on his social network page...

  • 1. 3K16:23 : 12.02.2024

    The Federal Media believes that the Parfensov are in violation of the Constitution by giving the Foremen of Lake Carelia.

    Moscow businessmen continue to seek a lake farm that provides drinking water for a whole village. And the republican authorities, instead of listening to people, ignore their views. Similarly, the Governor ' s team swallows from people when unique relict forests are cutting into the Caribbean and attempting to transfer the dairy market by destroying or changing the owner of OMC.

    The woman gave birth in the car during the strongest metel.

    A woman was born in a car during a snow storm. The young mother cleared the tractor.

  • 3. 3K15:26 : 12.02.2024

    In Petrozavodsk, the chairman of the cooperative in which the garage exploded requires the widow to recover millions of damage.

    The widow of the deceased during the explosion of the garage in Petrozavodsk said that the chairman of the garage cooperative required a loan to cover the damage allegedly caused by her husband.

  • 3. 1K15:16 : 12.02.2024

    There's a bucket in the corner. In the carel school, the ceiling leaks and the toilets are broken

    The school died in the subway.

    An enthusiasm passenger, Lunch, broke the glass at the airport.

    A man was late for a flight and fell off on airline employees.

  • 2. 6K14:20 : 12.02.2024

    As surprised and disappointed by hyperborei-2024. A detailed report for those who missed it.

    It was very cold, and it probably wasn't as crowded as usual, but those who came to Hyperborough 2024 didn't regret their decision. Let's talk and show how it was.

  • 4. 2K14:20 : 12.02.2024

    A sad mistake. The Russians did not enter the border because of an unspecified error in the passport.

    The customs officers did not let the residents of Ekaterinburg on board the plane because of an unspecified technical error in the passport and withdrew the document. A man couldn't find a mistake on his own.

  • 5. 0K14:15 : 12.02.2024

    The accident girl killed her husband in the accident.

    The young couple in the Siberian tract was in a tragic accident, and his husband didn't make it to the ambulance.

  • 3. 0K14:03 : 12.02.2024

    In Carelia, a young man fell into the old fishing moon.

    In the old fishing moon, a 26-year-old young man in Kostomuksha failed. Let's remind you, it happened in a popular place in a town hallway, near the preacher...

    This year, the cost of the date will grow by 10 per cent compared to last year, and the Tinkoff Data analytical project has been calculated. Every year, the project calculates Tinkoff...

  • 63213:50 : 12.02.2024

    Parents in Russia lack a nanny with experience

    The demand for nanny services was higher in early 2024. Now the nanny chooses a family, not the other way around.

  • 1.7K13:48 : 12.02.2024

    Aircraft at the airport: the aircraft hijacked the vehicle during landing

    The emergency occurred at the Moscow airport of Sheremievo. The plane hit the wing of the car. At that point, there were passengers on board.

  • 2. 6K13:31 : 12.02.2024

    Three young children died in a terrible fire: the mother had not been able to save them.

    Three young children died in a fire in the Krasnodar Krai. According to the investigation, a private house on Vodnikov Street was burned early on 12 February...

  • 2. 2K13:27 : 12.02.2024

    Karelia almost died at the party.

    In Seguj, the company of acquaintances decided to throw a party. The buddies gathered in a house on Gagarin Street. During the fun, two men were choked.

  • 1.5K13:24 : 12.02.2024

    Bad news for animal owners: feed is expensive

    Russian producers lack sufficient capacity to feed all cats and dogs in the country.

  • 1. 4K13:11 : 12.02.2024

    A 10-year-old boy stole the car and launched a mass accident.

    The schoolgirl saw a car parked in the backyard of the house and decided to ride a little. Got behind the wheel and drove a few dozen metres. However, the office failed and travelled to the " meeting " .

  • 1.5K13:00 12.02.2024

    The residents of Carelia were discharged from the apartment against his will.

    A man in the Olonek district has been assigned an apartment under social employment as a needy. He signed up in the apartment, but according to the court, he didn't live in it for a day.

  • 1.5K12:49 : 12.02.2024

    The man was poisoned to death on the car was his friend in the hospital.

    In the car wash, a man died from chemical poisoning. Another victim is hospitalized with acute poisoning.

  • 10. 0K12:39 : 12.02.2024

    An officer died in an explosion in Petrozavodska ' s garage, leaving three children.

    A 55-year-old Alexander Warov died in an explosion in Petrozavodska's garage. As his friend told us, the deceased has three children left. One classmate, friend...

  • 1. 2K12:12 : 12.02.2024

    The ice-creaming car smashed the eye of the pedestrian.

    In the Kemero region, a small ice scattered from the car ' s wheels and shattered the eye of the pedestrian: the chrystal was destroyed, and the rainbow was almost completely destroyed. The medics of the Kemero Regional Hospital managed to save their eyes.

  • 1. 9K12:07 : 12.02.2024

    In Carelia, a pregnant woman was chosen from a broken car after a terrible accident.

    A pregnant woman was injured in a fatal accident that happened last Friday in the Medevigor district. There were two frontal cars on the track...

  • 2.5K11:57 : 12.02.2024

    " Safe and cynical " . The girl who trespassed Rodina Mother's monument was sent to SIZO

    In July, a 23-year-old Alain put a video on the network where she shaved the breasts of the Monument called Mother! A girl was prosecuted under the heading of " the rehabilitation of Nazism " .

  • 2. 4K11:52 : 12.02.2024

    The famous football player died in 31 years.

    A man's been fighting a serious illness for years.

  • 5. 2K11:45 : 12.02.2024

    The missing five-year-old girl was found murdered in the woods under tons of snow

    The girl and mom disappeared on January 20th. In a few days, the Greeder driver came across a woman's body that was only identified by tattoo and earring. Two weeks later, we found the body of a five-year-old child.

  • 4.7K11:36 : 12.02.2024

    There's a video of the wrecked helicopter leaving Carelia.

    This morning, an MFL convoy accompanied by GIBD left the Prince region towards St. Petersburg. Helicopter debris is covered by a special fabric. The video published...

  • 2. 6K11:22 : 12.02.2024

    The officers explained why the people of Carelia paid so much in winter for heating.

    The people of Carelia are shocked by the heating bills and are actively signing a petition against them. The directors say there's no reason to disturb...

  • 2. 0K11:16 : 12.02.2024

    In the Russian region, fines will be imposed for feeding homeless animals

    In Astrakhan province, harsh measures have been taken to combat homeless dogs and cats.
